column4: If its writable and hasn't been finalised then it will bring up nautilus-burn I believe
I was thinking that but I didn't burn the disk so I don't know if it has been finalised, is there anyway to view the contents of the disk though?
I tried /media/cdrom but it doesn't display any files, although there is a stop sign like image in the information bar, does that mean I need to be root?
i've already tried that there is nothing in that folder either
You sure the DVD works? Tried on other systems? (sorry to ask, but always eliminate the obvious first :)
yeah i'm sure the DVD works, it works on all of my other computers (ask any questions you like I appriciate the help :P )
I'm not quite sure how to fix this. Does it mount other CDs/DVDs ok?
This has happened before, sometimes it works and sometimes it doesn't
other cd/dvd's are ok though yeah
Try posting to project-utopia's mailing lists cos it sounds like HAL being confused
what do you mean by information bit?
ok will do, to the left of the nautilus window just under where it says "address" in the address bar there is a grey rectangle that says information
I'm not completely sure what you mean by browser mode?
One window... no memory of where on the desktop it is put
I shed browser mode a long time ago so I've forgotten its affordances
